Content: Being capable of desiginin Prototype plants for certain planets might
be an interesting feature, but I doubt it would do much and create a
lot of additional pointers, since the local life should deviate from
the genetic template (if clear rules would be defined this memory
consumption could be reduced so the ''Terran cow'' template exists only
once but creates subtypes for Earth and a terraformed Mars
automatically using their enviromental data to manipulate its values).
Creating the perfect tree or the best dog might be a nice vanity
